captions.text: The burning question of the day?

Whatever it is, it's not burning,
let me tell you that.

When the best in the world
plays the best in the world,
No wonder you came to Zlatan.

Let's say there's a defender willing to
make an 89 meter run in the 94th minute.

But then, there's a striker willing
to track back to tackle him.
who can score a header from the corner.

But then the other keeper has the
courage to risk life and limb to save it.

Whoever takes the risk to do something
no one else would dare to try,

is the one who will separate
the teams and win it for his country!
Back to the original burning question...
Zlatan is cooking a Risk Everything omelet.

title: Zlatan's burning question of the day: What separates the best from the best?
